title: Jobs Report, Fed Outlook, Dimon’s Emergency Surgery
itunes:title: Jobs Report, Fed Outlook, Dimon’s Emergency Surgery
description:
Tendayi Kapfidze, Chief Economist at LendingTree, discusses the jobs report and Fed outlook. Michael Moore, Bloomberg News U.S. Finance Team Leader, talks about Jamie Dimon's emergency surgery putting the spotlight on JPMorgan's bench. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Peter Waldman share their insight on farmers fighting Deere over fixing an $800,000 tractor.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
